name: Biting Frost
description: Best part about frost... bodies of the fallen don't rot so quickly.

name: Impenetrable Fog
description: A good commander's dream... a bad one's horror.

name: Torrential Rain
description: Even the rain in this land smells like piss.

name: Clear Weather
description: The sun's still shining... somewhere.

name: Ballista
description: Usually we give 'em female names. 'Like Jenny?' 'More like Bertha.'

name: Blue Stripes Commando
description: I'll do anything for Temeria. Mostly, though, I kill for her.

name: Catapult
description: The gods help those who have better catapults.

name: Crinfrid Reavers Dragon Hunter
description: Haven't had much luck with monsters of late, so we enlisted.

name: Dethmold
description: I once made a prisoner vomit his own entrails... Ah! Good times...

name: Dun Banner Medic
description: Stitch red to red, white to white, and everything'll be alright.

name: Esterad Thyssen
description: Like all Thyssen men, he was tall, powerfully built and criminally handsome.

name: John Natalis
description: That Square should bear the names of my soldiers, of the dead. Not mine.

name: Kaedweni SIEGE Expert
description: 'You gotta recalibrate the arm by 5 degrees.' 'Do what by the what now?'

name: Keira Metz
description: If I'm to die today. I wish to look smashing for the occasion.

name: Phillipa Eilhart
description: Soon the power of the kings will wither, and the Lodge shall seize its rightful place.

name: Poor F*cking Infantry
description: I's a war veteran! ... spare me a crown?

name: Prince Stennis
description: He ploughin' wears golden armor. Golden. 'Course he's an arsehole.

name: Redanian Foot Soldier
description: I've bled for Redania! I've killed for Redania!

name: Sabrina Glevissig
description: Daughter of the Kaedweny Wilderness

name: Sheldon Skaggs
description: I was there, on the front lines! Right where the fightin' was thickest!

name: SIEGE Tower
description: I love the clamor of siege towers in the morning. Sounds like victory.

name: Siegfried of Denesle
description: We're on the same side, witcher. You'll realize this one day.

name: Sigismund Dijkstra
description: Gwent's like politics, just more honest.

name: Sile fe Tanasarville
description: The Lodge lacks humility. Our lust for power may yet be our undoing.

name: Thaler
description: We aren't all ploughin' philanderers. Some of us have depthâ€¦

name: Trebuchet
description: Castle won't batter itself down, now will it? Get them trebuchets rollin'!

name: Vernon Roche
description: A patriot... and a real son of a bitch.

name: Ves
description: Better to live one day as a kind than a whole life as a beggar.

name: Yarpen
description: The world belongs to whoever's best at crackin' skulls and impregnatin' lasses.
